attributes.additional_details:
With the situation in Ukraine ever worsening and with President Putin stuck in a Cold War frame of mind, many nations believe that something needs to be done to show Russia can't get away with breaching UN charters and agreements.

Russia has clearly invaded sovereign Ukrainian territory, and we as guarantors of the said nation in peril must show Putin a clear message that these actions do have consequences.

He cannot get away with destabilising the peace of Europe.

Therefore diplomatic and economic sanctions must be at least drawn up to just show Russia we will not bend down and show weakness.
